name: A Coffee A Day Keeps Troubles Away
name_original: A Coffee A Day Keeps Troubles Away
description:
Have you ever had a nice convo with a coupe of peculiar people? 

Well, in this game you play as a barista who just opened up their new cafe and their first costumers are quite the peculiar people. Listen to their sotries and make the beverage they want and maybe, if you egt enough of them right, they will tell you some nice and engaging stories.

Art - Beatriz Azevedo

Programming - Afonso Ormonde and Diogo Pires

Audio - Diogo Pires

Made in assocation with  GameDev Técnico.
